privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: ViziAI takes your privacy seriously. This policy explains what data we collect, how we use it, and your rights. We keep it simple and transparent — no legalese.

dataCollection.title: What We Collect
dataCollection.description: When you use ViziAI, we collect:

items.account: Your Google account email and name (for authentication)
items.bloodTests: Blood test PDF files you upload (temporarily stored during processing)
items.labValues: Extracted lab values, metric names, and reference ranges
items.tracking: Health tracking data you manually enter (weight, blood pressure)
items.usage: Basic usage analytics (page visits, feature usage) via Google Analytics

dataStorage.title: How We Store Your Data
dataStorage.description: Your data is stored securely in a Neon Postgres database. PDF files are temporarily stored in Vercel Blob during processing and deleted after extraction is complete. All connections use HTTPS encryption.

aiProcessing.title: AI Processing
aiProcessing.description: When you upload a blood test PDF, we use OpenAI's API to extract lab values from the document. The PDF content is sent to OpenAI for processing and is subject to OpenAI's data usage policies. We do not use your health data to train AI models.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.description: We use essential cookies for authentication (keeping you logged in) and a locale preference cookie (remembering your language choice). Google Analytics uses cookies for anonymous usage statistics. We do not use advertising or tracking cookies.

items.access: Access all data we store about you
items.export: Export your data in a standard format
items.delete: Request deletion of your account and all associated data
items.withdraw: Withdraw consent and stop using the service at any time

dataDeletion.title: Data Deletion
dataDeletion.description: You can delete individual reports, profiles, or your entire account from the Settings page. When you delete data, it is permanently removed from our database. There is no recovery.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: For privacy-related questions or data requests, contact us at:

seo.defaultDescription: Upload your blood test results and get AI-powered analysis with visual health insights. Track trends across time and languages.
seo.landingDescription: Upload blood test PDFs in any language and get instant AI analysis. Track health trends, compare results over time, and manage family profiles — all for free.
